name: a day at the beach
description:
a day at the beach is a real simple game developed and launched for the Death by Audio Arcade x Dreamhouse arcade cabinet collaboration. you can play it on the DreamboxXx here.  

it exists largely thanks to the love and thoughtfulness of my friends, who supported me through an unfortunate decision to roll my own JS game framework.

this game started as a code example for my (successful!) application to Recurse Center. in that spirit, the code is available here.  if you'd like to know more about RC - or are considering writing a web game from scratch and want to be scared straight -  message me.

    .-.     .-.     .-.     .-.     .-.     .-.     .-.
`._.'   `._.'   `._.'   `._.'   `._.'   `._.'   `._.'   `._.'

background art by bailey steele

and of course, @bridgs, who invited me to jam!  💖
